channel.title: Oooq on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours
channel.description: Recent content in Oooq on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

item.title: Create a virtual undercloud with TripleO Quickstart
item.description: In this blog post I’ll discuss how I’m currently using TripleO Quickstart to instantiate a virtual machine on a remote virtual machine host from my workstation. In follow up blog posts I’ll discuss how to utilize the virtual machine to provision both virtual and baremetal overclouds from the virtual machine.
